text.headline: Airborne viruses in the movies
text.text: Right or wrong, some movies featured airborne viruses

text.headline: I am Legend: Smug Doctor weaponizes Measles to cure cancer
text.text: Measles with mods to cure cancer plot-line. Nearly all of humanity dead inside of three years: "It is airborne" .. "it may be". A "contact route" in addition to airborne did not make much sense.
